name: ProjectTeo
description:
History
The main character named Theo was born on the planet "T". The whole world of the planet has dangerous caves into which it is forbidden to descend. Together with the main character, you have to explore the underworld avoiding dangers.

ProjectTeo - Teo is a brave resident of the Underworld "T"

Game features:
  • Collecting keys
  • Dangerous saws
  • Convenient management
  • The ability to replenish health
  • Difficult levels
  • Achievements obtained by passing levels.

The main character "Theo" has 4 powerful wings that allow you to smoothly descend and maneuver between deadly saws and dangerous inhabitants of the underworld.

To complete the level, you need to collect keys on the entire level. The number of keys required to move to a new level is indicated near the teleport.
